meanings.definition: A type of brimless cap worn by men in Turkey and neighboring countries.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his calpack to the market.
meanings.sent2: The calpack shielded his head from the sun during the hot summer days.
meanings.sent3: The calpack looked like a cozy nest for his head.
meanings.sent4: His calpack was a symbol of his cultural heritage.
meanings.sent5: The bright red calpack stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A type of headgear worn by soldiers in the Ottoman Empire.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers marched in formation, each wearing a calpack.
meanings.sent2: The calpacks added a touch of tradition to the soldiers' uniforms.
meanings.sent3: The soldiers' calpacks made them look like a united front.
meanings.sent4: The calpacks were a sign of loyalty to the empire.
meanings.sent5: The shiny badges on the calpacks gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional head covering worn by men in Central Asia.
meanings.sent1: The intricate patterns on his calpack showcased his craftsmanship.
meanings.sent2: The calpack was passed down through generations in his family.
meanings.sent3: He playfully tilted his calpack to the side, causing laughter among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The calpack was a crown of honor in his village.
meanings.sent5: The colorful threads of the calpack weaved a story of tradition.
